reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, with one noting it's perfect for dressing up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, soft handfeel, light weight sweater knit
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Beautiful fit , I ordered a size medium. I am 5’7”and it covers my butt. It is a light sweater knit with spandex to help keep its form. The knit is 10 stitches per inch making it a lightweight sweater knit. The handfeel is really nice soft the knit is tight and we’ll have a low snag probability. The color is a raspberry fudge Pantone. I will buy in other colors. Read more
items.author: Natalie Pyper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit as pictured and are soft
items.body: I ordered a few of these in several colors and am happy with them. They are soft and actually fit like the photo shows. I machine wash mine in cold water instead of handwashing and they have been fine. Overall they are cozy, cute tops. Read more
items.author: Thomas Tomko

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft
items.body: For reference, I am 135lbs, and I am 5'5" tall. I ordered a size Small and it fits perfectly, still with a bit of an oversized fit. This sweater is versatile; I can wear this with jeans, yoga pants, or a skirt, and it looks amazing with all of those pieces. This sweater is very soft. I've washed it numerous times and it washed and dried well and has remained soft. It has not faded. I initially ordered black, and returned to order the burgundy. The burgundy is more of a darker brick red. This is truly a nice sweater, and I am pretty picky. Read more
items.author: Grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Nice thin sweater, perfect for Texas weather, soft and comfy. Read more
items.author: AngieMcT

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted longer sleeves
items.body: It was a cute sweater & fit fine, except sleeves were a bit too short for my arms. I’m 5”7 for reference. Returning for that reason. Read more
items.author: jesse howser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirt!!!!!!
items.body: I was expecting to get a cheap quality throw-away sweater, but this was a nice quality, soft shirt, and it lays off the shoulder perfectly!!!! Bought this again in two more colors- Read more
items.author: Darby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soo cute
items.body: Very cute love this top bought a couple different colors Read more
items.author: Amanda Phillips

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Color is actually cobalt, very pretty but not what I expected in color and style.
items.body: Not a fan of the fit and fabric. It's scratchy and cheap feeling and more boat neck than off the shoulder and that's coming from a 5'8 size LG lady that knows to size up for the drapey fit with most of these products. The sleeves have a balloon type of fit which just isnt it for me. The waist band is just weird, way too long in length like I can just picture myself adjusting this top all night instead of having an effortless drape effect. It reminds me of those weird tops we all wore with leggings at one point in which we werent sure if it was a mini dress or a long top lol. I really do love cobalt blue, but wanted a navy blue and this was definitely a bright cobalt blue. For the price I'd rather return and keep looking for something softer with a fit that isn't so odd. Read more
items.author: Gigi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: X1-camel, Navy, Khaki, White, X1-caramel, X1-blue, X1-coffee, Burgundy, X1-pink, Black, X1-green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
